✓ CRISIL (Credit Rating Information Services of India Limited) is a global analytics company that provides ratings, research, risk, and policy advisory services. ✓ It was established in 1987 and is headquartered in Mumbai, India.  Follow us: Official Site, Telegram, Facebook, Instagram, Youtube 183  ✓ CRISIL is India's leading ratings agency and also a leading provider of high-end research to the world's largest banks and leading corporations. Q. Credit Rating Agencies in India is regulated by which of the following entities?
options: Securities and Exchange Board of India
answer: Securities and Exchange Board of India
